name: ExecuteGraphqlQuery
description:
Executes a GraphQL query on Weaviate.

Use this tool to perform data queries and exploration on the Weaviate platform by executing a provided GraphQL query.

parameters.name: operation_name
parameters.description: The name of the operation if multiple operations exist in the GraphQL query.

value_schema.description: The name of the operation if multiple exist in the query.

parameters.name: graphql_query
parameters.description: A GraphQL query string to execute on Weaviate, following GraphQL syntax.

parameters.name: query_variables
parameters.description: Additional JSON variables for the GraphQL query used to provide external values for operations.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the weaviate API.

parameters.description: The name of the operation if multiple exist in the query.
